EmailTemplate.name: SW: NW L5 w/o SW
EmailTemplate.subject: New SL5 w/o a SW contact; please find a SW for {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
Please see {!Contact.Name}'s account. They are a new level 5 but do not yet have a SW contact assigned to them.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a new level 5 without a SW contact signs up.
